blacklist_toggle_show_banned_desc: Display a chat message when a player in the blacklist joins the game
blacklist_toggle_show_not_banned_desc: Display a chat message when a player who is not in the blacklist joins the game
blacklist_button_chat_name_desc: Change the name used when showing chat notifications
blacklist_button_chat_color_desc: Change the color used when showing chat notifications
blacklist_button_popup_menu_desc: Add a player to the blacklist
